short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto refresh a list of web pages after any number of seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Small and easy to use chrome extension that auto reloads a list of URLs according to your settings.

Features:
* Easy to use and setup
* No unnecessary permissions required
* Does not track you
